column8: chicken breast; basil leaves; garlic; chili peppers; soy sauce; oyster sauce; sugar; salt; pepper; vegetable oil
column11: 1. Heat oil in a wok. 2. Add garlic and chili peppers, stir-fry for 1 minute. 3. Add chicken and stir-fry until browned. 4. Add basil leaves, soy sauce, oyster sauce, sugar, salt, and pepper. 5. Stir-fry for another 5 minutes. 6. Serve hot.
